sections.title: Souldrinker (PZO1139) (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Souldrinker (PZO1139) class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiencies (Souldrinker (PZO1139))
sections.description: A souldrinker gains proficiency with the favored weapon of her chosen daemonic patron.

sections.title: Spells per Day/Spells Known (Souldrinker (PZO1139))
sections.description: At indicated levels, a souldrinker gains additional spells per day and spells known as if she had gained a level in a previous spellcasting class, but no other class benefits.

sections.title: Apocalyptic Vow (Ex) (Souldrinker (PZO1139))
sections.description: The souldrinker makes a vow to one of the Four Horsemen or a daemon harbinger, making resurrection difficult but granting +3 bonus on saves against death effects and negative energy.

sections.title: Cacodaemon Familiar (Ex) (Souldrinker (PZO1139))
sections.description: The souldrinker gains a cacodaemon familiar that replaces any existing familiar by devouring it, and can use soul gems created by the cacodaemon.

sections.title: Obedience (Ex) (Souldrinker (PZO1139))
sections.description: The souldrinker must perform daily obedience to her patron to maintain class abilities and must choose evangelist, exalted, or sentinel path for boon progression.

sections.title: Enervation (Sp) (Souldrinker (PZO1139))
sections.description: The souldrinker can cast enervation as a spell-like ability, starting with 2 uses per day at 2nd level and increasing to 6 uses per day at 8th level.

sections.title: Soul Pool (Su) (Souldrinker (PZO1139))
sections.description: The souldrinker maintains a pool of soul points gained by inflicting negative levels, which can be spent to create magic items, recover spell slots, or protect against negative levels.

sections.title: Daemonic Boon ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-), [Sp](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Spell-Like-Abilities-Sp-), or [Su](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Supernatural-Abilities-Su-)) (Souldrinker (PZO1139))
sections.description: The souldrinker gains three increasingly powerful boons from her patron at 3rd, 6th, and 9th levels based on her chosen Horseman or harbinger and boon category.

sections.title: Lesser Oblivion (Su) (Souldrinker (PZO1139))
sections.description: At 4th level, the souldrinker gains immunity to specific effects based on her chosen Horseman: diseases, aging/Constitution damage, bleed/Strength damage, or poisons/hunger.

sections.title: Oblivion (Sp) (Souldrinker (PZO1139))
sections.description: At 7th level, the souldrinker gains an at-will spell-like ability that costs 1 soul point per use, determined by her chosen Horseman.

sections.title: Greater Oblivion (Sp) (Souldrinker (PZO1139))
sections.description: At 10th level, the souldrinker gains a more powerful at-will spell-like ability that costs 3 soul points per use, determined by her chosen Horseman.
